name: ChangeCraft
description:
A small crafting game with a twist.

There is a web version but it has pretty poor performance on lower-end computers. For better performance, download the desktop versions.

Halfway through making the game we realised that it had quite limited gameplay so we essentially gave up. This is a polished version of that partial product.

Find the source at  https://github.com/nalton-software/godot-fire-jam.

For other projects, go to https://naltonsoftware.com and check out our Github profiles (ThatCoolCoder's, Calbabreaker's, Shared) and Replit profiles (ThatCoolCoder's Calbabreaker's)
